messages.title: WHAT THIS ELECTION IS ABOUT
messages.content: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest with Theresa May and the Conservatives - or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.

messages.title: STRONG LEADERSHIP FOR WARRINGTON
messages.content: We can't afford Jeremy Corbyn and his candidate here in Warrington North. We need strong and stable leadership in the national interest from Theresa May and Val Allen.

messages.title: HELPING YOUNG PEOPLE BUY THEIR OWN HOME
messages.content: As a mum, Val knows that getting onto the property ladder is a key priority for young families. "When I bought my home in Woolston some years ago, it cost Â£11,000. Now the prices may seem a lot different but the aspiration is just the same."

messages.title: MAKING A SUCCESS OF BREXIT
messages.content: Only a Conservative Government, under Theresa May, can secure the best Brexit negotiation outcome. Warrington North voted leave and we need a Conservative Member of Parliament who can back that decision up by following through on a strong message to Brussels without being tied to a coalition of chaos. Warrington guarantees a broad Brexit deal, benefiting both Val Allen and the North West. Vote for your Warrington Conservative candidate to give Prime Minister Theresa May a strong hand on the negotiations in our long-term national interest.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Theresa May has the plan and the proven leadership to deliver a better deal for ordinary, working people and make the right decisions for Britain.
Establish Britain as the strongest country in Europe, in economic growth and national security.
Build a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and creates secure and well-paid jobs. We will make sure there is growth and prosperity around the whole country.
Provide real opportunity for all. We will give everyone a chance to get on in life, by making sure there is a good school place for every child.
Secure a united nation by taking back control of our laws and our money from the EU.

issues.brexitEurope: Theresa May and the Conservatives trust the people's decision to take control. We will see through their choice of leaving the European Union.
issues.economy: Establish Britain as the strongest country in Europe, in economic growth and national security.
issues.education: We will make sure there is a good school place for every child.
issues.governance: Take back control of our laws and our money from the EU. We will see through their choice of leaving the European Union.

housing.content: Helping young families and first-time buyers purchase a home is a priority, ensuring the amenities and infrastructure to go with it.

endorsements.endorsement: Endorses Theresa May for strong and stable leadership.

quotes.text: Every vote cast for Theresa May and the Conservatives will strengthen Britain's hand in the Brexit negotiations.

images.caption: Theresa May with Val Allen and another member of the Conservative Party.
